law.text: Domestic stock, combined stock and mutual life, or mutual insurers shall be governed by the applicable provisions of the general statutes of this state relating to private corporations organized for profit, as such statutes are now or hereafter may be constituted, except where such general statutes are in conflict with the express provisions of this subtitle and the reasonable implications thereof, and in which case the provisions of this subtitle shall govern.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 24, sec. 3, effective June 18, 1970.
